values: 来自；源于；出自；从…来；自；从；起始于；基于；因为；由于；出于；远离；避免；使免遭；使免受；以防；以免；不在；没来；寄自；得自；与…相异；与…不同；由；由…制成；始于；根据；从…来看；（表示两者之间的距离）离；从 （某处离开）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指把有延展性的材料浇铸或塑成所需形状的物品。
比mould使用广泛，指用许多不同的方法制成不同形状的制品。
通常指对尚未成形的物品作进一步加工，使成为成品。
意义较窄，指用锤子和砧对金属材料进行加工或锻造。

word_group.brief_definition: 远离, 与...保持距离；外出
时不时, 有时, 偶尔
从...中学习；从...得到教益；向...学习
起因于, 源于, 由...造成
来自, 出生于；居住于；是…的结果, 由…造成
避免做某事；使某人避免做某事

bilingual.target: 我们从九点上课到一点。

bilingual.source: How can he get there from the post office?
How do you get home from school, Tom?
bilingual.target: 汤姆，你怎么从学校回家？

bilingual.source: How can we travel from Beijing to Xi'an?
bilingual.target: 我们怎么从北京去西安？

bilingual.source: What can you learn from these people?
bilingual.target: 你能从这些人身上学到什么？

bilingual.source: Tony, please phone me from the house.
bilingual.target: 托尼，请从家里给我打电话。

bilingual.source: Three weeks, starting from the beginning of July.
The view from the top was very scary!
bilingual.target: 从顶部看下去的景色非常吓人！

list.abstract: From是一种将MYSQL中以INT(11)存储的时间以“YYYY-MM-DD”格式来显示的字符。 它具有将返回值格式化的功能。

《梦魇绝镇》（From）是由杰克·本德执导，John Griffin担任编剧，哈罗德·佩里诺、卡塔琳娜·桑地诺·莫雷诺、艾恩·贝利、汉娜·切尔敏、Simon Webster等主演的科幻恐怖电视剧，于2022年2月20日在美国首播。 该剧是《梦魇绝镇》系列电视剧第一季，讲述了主角一行人被困在一个噩梦般的小镇，在找寻出路的同时，他们还得提防日落后怪物出没的故事。 《梦魇绝镇第二季》于2023年4月23日在美国首播。

yingyinNormal.en: One copy you inherited from Mom, the other from Dad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个从妈妈那里遗传得来，另一个从爸爸那里得来。

yingyinNormal.en: From the doorman to the CEO.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从门卫打到执行长。

yingyinNormal.en: You have come from Lake-town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是从长湖城来的。

yingyinNormal.en: You are from upstate? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是从北部来的吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: You won't get anything from me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你从我这里得不到任何信息。

yingyinNormal.en: Check it out. You can see it from the window.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从窗户能看得到。

yingyinNormal.en: How about to the street say from the balcony?
yingyinNormal.zh: 何不从阳台把它丢到街上？

yingyinNormal.en: They're already trying to hack it from us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们早就想从我们这儿偷学了。

yingyinNormal.en: My queen can now take your rook from below.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的皇后能从下面吃了你的车。

yingyinNormal.en: You gonna erase Bonnie from your head, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要把邦妮也从脑海里抹去吗？

yingyinNormal.en: A trick I learned from an old friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是我从一个老朋友那学到的小把戏。

yingyinNormal.en: Murder our family remotely from the sky.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又或者从空中远程谋杀我们的家人。

yingyinNormal.en: Saturday night just went from crazy to epic!
yingyinNormal.zh: 周六夜要从嗨翻升级成史诗级啦。

yingyinNormal.en: I asked you a question.Where did you come from?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我问你话呢，你们到底从哪来？

yingyinNormal.en: We hit him from all four sides. Hit him hard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从四面发动进攻，狠狠地打。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you want to talk about? Where you from?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想聊点什么？你是从哪里来的？

yingyinNormal.en: At ten, that big wave hits from over there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后到了10点，巨浪从那儿打过来。

yingyinNormal.en: Uh, well, from st. jude's, I've learned integrity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从圣·犹大学，我学会了诚实。

yingyinNormal.en: And what kind of doctor removes shoes from asses?
yingyinNormal.zh: 哪种医生能把鞋从屁股上取下来？

yingyinNormal.en: God. And I have to hear about it from Gunther.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老天，我还得从甘瑟那里听到这件事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 禁止做某事；禁止；不准许
控制自己不做(某事)；忍住...；避免...

examination_example.sentence: Some growth stems <highlight>from</highlight> a commitment by governments and farsighted businesses to fund cleaner energy sources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些增长源于政府和有远见的企业承诺为清洁能源提供资金。

examination_example.sentence: But it doesn't necessarily follow <highlight>from</highlight> findings like these that a world without work would be filled with unease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但从这些发现中不一定可以得出，一个没有工作的世界会充满不安。

examination_example.sentence: Global challenges and social innovation ought to receive much more attention <highlight>from</highlight> scientists, especially the young ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球挑战和社会创新应该从科学家，尤其是年轻科学家那里，得到更多的关注。

examination_example.sentence: What might have kept the Victorians <highlight>from</highlight> smiling for pictures in the 1890s?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在19世纪90年代，是什么阻止了维多利亚人为了拍照而微笑？

examination_example.sentence: The rule limited states' ability to seek long-term prosperity and has prevented market participants <highlight>from</highlight> competing on an even playing field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一规则限制了各州寻求长期繁荣的能力，并阻碍了市场参与者在公平的竞争环境中竞争。

examination_example.sentence: California has asked the justices to refrain <highlight>from</highlight> a sweeping ruling, particularly one that upsets the old assumption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加利福尼亚州已要求大法官避免作出大范围的裁决，尤其是是推翻旧假设的裁决。

examination_example.sentence: Digital services include everything <highlight>from</highlight> providing a platform for selling goods and services online to targeting advertising based on user data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字服务包括从提供在线商品销售和服务的平台，到基于用户数据的定向广告在内的一切。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>From</highlight> then on his sketches, which appeared under the pen name "Boz" in The Evening Chronicle, earned him a modest reputation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那以后，他以"Boz"为笔名在《晚间纪事》上发表短篇小说，获得了一定的赞誉。

examination_example.sentence: Beethoven's music tends to move <highlight>from</highlight> chaos to order as if order were an imperative of human existence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 贝多芬的音乐倾向于从混乱走向秩序，仿佛秩序是人类存在的必要条件。

examination_example.sentence: Plants can't run away <highlight>from</highlight> danger, so investing energy in a body system which recognizes a threat would be a very poor evolutionary strategy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物无法逃避危险，因此将能量投入到能够识别威胁的身体系统是一种非常差劲的进化策略。

examination_example.sentence: But Judge Patricia Millett rightly argued in a concurring opinion that "the result is unhinged <highlight>from</highlight> the realities of modern broadband service."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是Patricia Millett法官在赞同意见中正确地指出，“结果与现代宽带服务的现实脱节。”

examination_example.sentence: Planning documents pledged that the great legacy of the Games would be to lever a nation of sport lovers away <highlight>from</highlight> their couches.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 规划文件承诺，奥运会的伟大遗产将是让一个国家的体育爱好者远离他们的沙发。

examination_example.sentence: Society also suffers <highlight>from</highlight> excessive employment protections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社会也遭受到过度就业保护的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Employees suffer <highlight>from</highlight> salary cuts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 员工遭受减薪之苦。

examination_example.sentence: Malti and others have shown that cooperation and sharing can result <highlight>from</highlight> either sympathy or guilt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Malti和其他人已经表明，合作和分享可能来自同情或内疚。

examination_example.sentence: Ethics Professors do not differ <highlight>from</highlight> other professors on a range of behaviors, including voting rates, blood donation and returning library books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伦理学教授在一系列行为上与其他教授没有区别，包括投票率、献血和归还图书馆书籍。

examination_example.sentence: Plant biology is complex and fascinating, but it differs so greatly <highlight>from</highlight> that of animals that so-called evidence of plants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物生物学是复杂而迷人的，但它与动物生物学的差异如此之大，以至于我们无法找到所谓的植物的证据。

examination_example.sentence: Everybody wants to know how the people who will soon inhabit those empty office cubicles will differ <highlight>from</highlight> those who came before them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都想知道，即将居住在这些空办公室隔间里的人，会和之前的人有什么不同。

examination_example.sentence: And it is far <highlight>from</highlight> the only one of its type.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且这远远不是唯一的一种。

examination_example.sentence: The share of the population 65 and older was 16% in 2018, up 3.2% <highlight>from</highlight> the prior year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2018年，65岁及以上人口的比例为16%，比前一年增加了3.2%。

examination_example.sentence: About 20% of people 65 and older were in the workforce in February, up <highlight>from</highlight> an all-time low of 10% in January 1985.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年2月，65岁及以上人口中约有20%在工作，高于1985年1月10%的历史低点。

examination_example.sentence: Organic eggs went <highlight>from</highlight> being dismissed as a niche product in natural foods stores to being sold at Walmart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有机鸡蛋从在天然食品商店被视为小众产品，变成在沃尔玛热销。

word_usage.usage: from表示(时间和地点)“从...开始；始于” ，from ... to 指“..... 从...到....”。

from表示“离...”，常与介词away连用，示例：
Beijing is 2000 km from Guangzhou. 
北京离广州有2千公里。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 免除; 阻止; 防止

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 向...学习；意识到；吸取教训
避免做某事；使某人避免做某事

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: can't stop oneself from doing sth.

examination_example.sentence: There are two parks less than 10 minutes' walk <highlight>from</highlight> home where neighbourhood children gather to play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从家里步行不到10分钟，就有两个公园，附近的孩子们聚集在那里玩耍。

examination_example.sentence: In short, he loves postcards, and the excitement of getting a hand-written note <highlight>from</highlight> someone far away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，他喜欢明信片，以及收到远方某人手写的便条时的兴奋感。

examination_example.sentence: You need a seat which supports your back and the book should be at the right distance <highlight>from</highlight> your eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要一个能支撑你背部的座位，书本应与你的眼睛保持适当距离。

sense_info_list.zh: 免除; 阻止; 防止

examination_example.sentence: It keeps the suspect <highlight>from</highlight> hurting others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以防止嫌疑人伤害他人。

examination_example.sentence: To prevent the birds <highlight>from</highlight> being killed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了防止鸟被杀。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (from time to time)不时; 有时

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 从...中学习；从...得到教益；向...学习
来自；出生于；居住于；是…的结果；由…造成
从...选择；可供选择；从中进行选择
从…发展出来；来自；发展起来
从远处看；从远处；从远距离

examination_example.sentence: The solar panel, however, does not make much electricity <highlight>from</highlight> falling rain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，太阳能电池板并不能从降雨中产生很多电力。

examination_example.sentence: Last June, she finished China's Gaokao and received an offer <highlight>from</highlight> Sichuan International Study University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年6月，她完成了中国的高考，收到了四川外国语大学的录取通知书。

examination_example.sentence: I am <highlight>from</highlight> the Antarctic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我来自南极。

examination_example.sentence: Lots of colors and tastes to choose <highlight>from</highlight>, and some kinds of toothpaste are made just for children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有很多颜色和口味可供选择，有些牙膏是专门为儿童制作的。

examination_example.sentence: I was able to experience Chinese living and culture, <highlight>from</highlight> basic Tai Chi to Beijing Opera.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我能够体验中国的生活和文化，从基本的太极到京剧。

examination_example.sentence: Next I began to watch ants <highlight>from</highlight> a safe distance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来，我开始从安全的距离观察蚂蚁。

examination_example.sentence: Scott knew it was a female <highlight>from</highlight> its feather.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯科特根据它的羽毛判断它是雌性。

examination_example.sentence: Let kids experience real life and grow up by failing, keeping on trying, and sometimes gradually learning <highlight>from</highlight> making mistakes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让孩子体验真实的生活，在失败中成长，不断尝试，有时从错误中逐渐学习。

examination_example.sentence: What can you learn <highlight>from</highlight> the passage?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能从这篇文章中学到什么？

examination_example.sentence: Walking <highlight>from</highlight> one place to another may be a slow and difficult job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从一个地方走到另一个地方可能是一项缓慢而困难的工作。

examination_example.sentence: It still amazes me that I completely changed <highlight>from</highlight> almost hating math to loving it!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还是很惊讶，我完全从讨厌数学变成了热爱数学！

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>From</highlight> the day she began drawing at the age of two, she was an artist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从她两岁开始画画的那天起，她就是一名艺术家。

examination_example.sentence: Far <highlight>from</highlight> the door.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 离门很远。

examination_example.sentence: Coca-Cola, for example, placed the letters of its famous brand further away <highlight>from</highlight> each other to show social distancing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，可口可乐将其著名品牌的字母放在距离彼此更远的地方，以此表达社交距离。

examination_example.sentence: It's not far <highlight>from</highlight> your home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它离你家不远。

examination_example.sentence: But that didn't stop these three women <highlight>from</highlight> taking off and doing big things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这并没有阻止这三个女人开始干大事。

examination_example.sentence: Stop the enemies <highlight>from</highlight> sleeping well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让敌人睡不好觉。

examination_example.sentence: We may sometimes feel like there are certain things that are holding us back and stopping us <highlight>from</highlight> growing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有时可能会觉得有某些事情在阻挡我们，阻碍了我们成长。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, you can never keep yourself away <highlight>from</highlight> stress in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，生活中，你永远无法让自己远离压力。

examination_example.sentence: He went bankrupt (破产) and his wife went away <highlight>from</highlight> him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他破产了，他的妻子就离开了他。

examination_example.sentence: Grandma hugged me tight, and suddenly I felt as though a big stone was gone <highlight>from</highlight> my stomach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奶奶紧紧地抱着我，突然我觉得好像有一块大石头从我的肚子里消失了。

sense_info_list.zh: (from time to time)不时; 有时

examination_example.sentence: Then we check our mobiles <highlight>from</highlight> time to time during the meal, to see whether we get "liked" or not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我们在吃饭的时候时不时地查看手机，看看我们是否被点“赞”了。

examination_example.sentence: Xu Ruiyang an 18-year-old student <highlight>from</highlight> Kunming, has suffered(遭受) <highlight>from</highlight> spina muscular atrophy (脊柱肌肉萎缩) since she was 2 years old.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自昆明的18岁学生徐瑞阳从2岁开始就患有脊髓性肌萎缩症。

word_usage.usage:
from、since在表示时间时含义不同。
（1）since是往过去追溯至事件起点，不用于将来时态。
（2）而from只表示事件起点，现在、过去、将来时态都可使用，要表示起止需用from...to/until...结构。
